title: Define Project Requirements for Code Generation Tool
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the HerramientaCodigoIa project's code generation tool, considering factors such as scalability, platform compatibility (Windows, Linux, macOS), programming languages (Python, Java, JavaScript), error handling strategies (logging, exceptions), integration with existing tools (Jenkins, Git), and version control (GitHub or Bitbucket). Document these requirements in a clear, concise, and comprehensive manner, providing examples wherever possible. Include specific considerations for edge cases, performance optimization, and documentation standards (including API documentation). The requirements should also cover security concerns such as data privacy and protection, and compatibility with commonly used IDEs.

title: Design the Code Generation Algorithm
description: Develop a design for the code generation algorithm that considers various programming languages and project requirements.

title: Develop the Frontend Interface for User Input
description: Design and implement a user-friendly frontend interface for users to input their project requirements.

title: Implement Backend Services for Code Generation
description: Develop the backend services responsible for code generation based on user input.

title: Integrate Database for Storing and Retrieving Project Requirements
description: Create or integrate an existing database to store and retrieve project requirements for future use.

title: Perform Unit Tests and Debugging for Code Generator
description: Write unit tests and perform debugging on the code generator to ensure proper functioning.
dependencies: Implement Backend Services for Code Generation

title: Deploy the Automatic Code Generation Tool
description: Prepare and deploy the code generation tool to a production environment.
dependencies: Perform Unit Tests and Debugging for Code Generator
